thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com
thread.title: JP

author: JP
title: JP
text: This was my 3rd online purchase from Opticontacts.com. I have preferred to stay with them because I feel that their prices are fare and their customer service is strong & caring. With this particular order I had a problem with the pricing and when I called customer service I was greeted happily & professionally and my problem was handled & corrected right away. The only reason that I give them 4 vs 5 stars is that I feel that all these online companies could be more competitive with their pricing on contacts as the prices are all over the place and it's very tedious to shop around and make sure you are getting the best price out there.
